                      作者：黄东旭，PingCAP 联合创始人兼 CTO 位于 M87 中心的特大质量黑洞示意图（© EHT Collaboration） 今天的文章我想从这张模糊的照片说起。 相信很多小伙伴对这张照片并不陌生，这是去年人类第一次拍摄的 M87 ...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021811835" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">6</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021811835" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/pingcap">PingCAP</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月22日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021793564"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021793564" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/bVbDBE0)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021793564"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">谷歌云计算部门被曝裁员 50 人，是谷歌不行还是云计算不行？</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      2020 年开年，谷歌宣布收购无代码应用程序开发平台 AppSheet，打响了云战争的第一枪。谷歌表示，AppSheet 的平台“补充了谷歌云的战略，重新构想了应用程序开发空间。”
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021793564" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">7</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021793564" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/weepie">徐九</a><i class="fa fa-check-circle userauth ml5" title="SegmentFault 编辑" data-toggle="tooltip"></i><span class="dot">·</span>2月20日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021787021"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021787021" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021787024)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021787021"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">正则表达式引擎执行原理——从未如此清晰！</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      目前越来越多的网站、编辑器、编程语言都已支持一种叫“正则表达式”的字符串查找“公式”，有过编程经验的同学都应该了解正则表达式（Regular Expression 简写regex）是什么东西，它是一种字符串匹配的模式（pattern...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021787021" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up hot"></i></span><span class="votes-num hot ">102</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021787021" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/pig66">猪哥66</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月19日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021782703"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021782703" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021782706)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021782703"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">Flutter EasyLoading - 让全局Toast/Loading更简单</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      ✨flutter_easyloading: 一个简单易用的Flutter插件，包含23种loading动画效果、进度条展示、Toast展示。纯Flutter端实现，支持iOS、Android。✨开源地址：[链接]
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021782703" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up hot"></i></span><span class="votes-num hot ">17</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021782703" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/huangjianke_5c4aab8c66ad9">huangjianke</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月19日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021777457"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021777457" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021777460)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021777457"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">如何快速构建优异的 React 搜索体验</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      构建搜索体验是一项艰巨的任务。它初看起来很简单：构建搜索栏，将数据放入数据库，然后让用户输入内容对数据库进行查询。但是，在数据建模、基础逻辑，当然还有总体设计和用户体验方面，还有许多事情需要考虑。
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021777457" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">6</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021777457" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/elastic_cn">Elastic</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月18日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021772888"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021772888" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/iawKicic66ubH4U4oNRSZrCeiaYY9hGfb5w7CfufLuPjL7ibv3y2m6BASb2HdClib57MX258iadrWoQdH9QKRjhMrvH3Q/640?wx_fmt=jpeg&amp;amp;tp=webp&amp;amp;wxfrom=5&amp;amp;wx_lazy=1&amp;amp;wx_co=1)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021772888"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">原创干货：前端单元测试Jest零基础入门教学</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      写在开头： 单元测试对于很多人比较模式，它是一种推动开发，或者提高产品质量的手段， 我画一张图，大家就能理解 其实单元测试，就是先编写单元测试代码，然后使用单元测试框架，去模拟环境（例如浏览器），然后...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021772888" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">14</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021772888" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/jerrytanjinjie">Peter谭金杰</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月18日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021775938"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021775938" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/bVbDw3w)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021775938"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">一文带你怼明白进程和线程通信原理</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      进程是需要频繁的和其他进程进行交流的。例如，在一个 shell 管道中，第一个进程的输出必须传递给第二个进程，这样沿着管道进行下去。因此，进程之间如果需要通信的话，必须要使用一种良好的数据结构以至于不能被...

        if (typeof URL != 'undefined') {
            var baseUrl = new URL('https://segmentfault.com');

            if (baseUrl.protocol != currentUrl.protocol
                || baseUrl.host != currentUrl.host) {

var _oa = [], OA_google = true;

function OA_script(src, cb) {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    
    if (cb) {
        s.onload = cb;
    }
    
    s.async = 1;
    s.defer = 1;
    s.src = src;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(s, m);
}

function OA_show(name) {
    _oa.push(name);
    document.write('<div id="OA_holder_' + name + '"></div>');
}

mobileScroll(
    function(direction) { 
        try {
            if (direction === 'down') {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.add('hidden')
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.remove('hidden')
            }
        } catch(err) {}
    }
);    
function mobileScroll( fn ) {
    var beforeScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
        fn = fn || function() {};
    window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
        var afterScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
            delta = afterScrollTop - beforeScrollTop;
        if( delta === 0 ) return false;
        fn( delta > 0 ? "down" : "up" );
        beforeScrollTop = afterScrollTop;
    }, false);
}
</script><div class="row hidden-xs hidden-sm"><div class="col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="sf-header__logo"><h1><a href="/">SegmentFault</a></h1></div><div><ul class="menu list-inline pull-left hidden-xs"><li class="menu__item"><a href="/" class="active-nav">首页</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/questions" class="">问答</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/blogs" class="">专栏</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a class=" " href="/lives" class="">课程</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/events" class="">活动</a></li><li class="menu__item menu__item--more dropdown"><a href="##" class="dropdown-toggle dropdownBtn" data-toggle="dropdown">

            <span>Arm 计算</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="tech-square hidden-xs">
          <h5 class="tech-square-title mt0 mb15">技术频道</h5>
        </div>
      </div>

          <a href="/events" class="more-btn pull-right">更多</a>
          <div class="activity-title">活动推荐</div>
          <div class="activity-recommend-area"></div>
        </div>

            <script type='text/javascript'>
                OA_show(1);
            </script>

    </div>

    (function (w) {
        w.SF = {
            staticUrl: "https://cdn.segmentfault.com/v-5e154194"
        };
        w.SF.token = (function () {
    var _3HXpTm = '5'//'r'

    for (var i = 0; i < _gNWzrHp.length; i ++) {

    }

})();;
    })(window);

        type: "",
        text: '',
        table: {"ban_post":[1,"\u4f60\u5df2\u7ecf\u88ab\u7981\u8a00, \u65e0\u6cd5\u8fdb\u884c\u6b64\u64cd\u4f5c, \u5982\u6709\u7591\u4e49\u8bf7\u63d0\u4ea4\u7533\u8bc9, \u6216\u8005\u53d1\u90ae\u4ef6\u5230pr@segmentfault.com"]}
    };

        var ddosMode = false;
    
        (function (currentUrl) {
        if (typeof URL != 'undefined') {
            var baseUrl = new URL('https://segmentfault.com');

            if (baseUrl.protocol != currentUrl.protocol
                || baseUrl.host != currentUrl.host) {
                window.location.href = baseUrl.protocol + '//' + baseUrl.host
                    + currentUrl.pathname + currentUrl.search + currentUrl.hash;
            }
        }
    })(window.location);
    </script>

var _oa = [], OA_google = true;

function OA_script(src, cb) {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    
    if (cb) {
        s.onload = cb;
    }
    
    s.async = 1;
    s.defer = 1;
    s.src = src;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(s, m);
}

function OA_show(name) {
    _oa.push(name);
    document.write('<div id="OA_holder_' + name + '"></div>');
}

mobileScroll(
    function(direction) { 
        try {
            if (direction === 'down') {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.add('hidden')
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.remove('hidden')
            }
        } catch(err) {}
    }
);    
function mobileScroll( fn ) {
    var beforeScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
        fn = fn || function() {};
    window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
        var afterScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
            delta = afterScrollTop - beforeScrollTop;
        if( delta === 0 ) return false;
        fn( delta > 0 ? "down" : "up" );
        beforeScrollTop = afterScrollTop;
    }, false);
}
</script><div class="row hidden-xs hidden-sm"><div class="col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="sf-header__logo"><h1><a href="/">SegmentFault</a></h1></div><div><ul class="menu list-inline pull-left hidden-xs"><li class="menu__item"><a href="/" class="active-nav">首页</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/questions" class="">问答</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/blogs" class="">专栏</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a class=" " href="/lives" class="">课程</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/events" class="">活动</a></li><li class="menu__item menu__item--more dropdown"><a href="##" class="dropdown-toggle dropdownBtn" data-toggle="dropdown">

                      前不久，埃隆·马斯克（Elon Musk）在国外的社交平台上发布了一条推文，准备在自己的家里办一场「超级有趣的黑客马拉松」，一同出席参与的还有特斯拉的 AI 与自动驾驶团队。

                      作者：黄东旭，PingCAP 联合创始人兼 CTO 位于 M87 中心的特大质量黑洞示意图（© EHT Collaboration） 今天的文章我想从这张模糊的照片说起。 相信很多小伙伴对这张照片并不陌生，这是去年人类第一次拍摄的 M87 ...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021811835" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">6</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021811835" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/pingcap">PingCAP</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月22日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021793564"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021793564" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/bVbDBE0)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021793564"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">谷歌云计算部门被曝裁员 50 人，是谷歌不行还是云计算不行？</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      2020 年开年，谷歌宣布收购无代码应用程序开发平台 AppSheet，打响了云战争的第一枪。谷歌表示，AppSheet 的平台“补充了谷歌云的战略，重新构想了应用程序开发空间。”
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021793564" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">7</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021793564" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/weepie">徐九</a><i class="fa fa-check-circle userauth ml5" title="SegmentFault 编辑" data-toggle="tooltip"></i><span class="dot">·</span>2月20日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021787021"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021787021" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021787024)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021787021"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">正则表达式引擎执行原理——从未如此清晰！</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      目前越来越多的网站、编辑器、编程语言都已支持一种叫“正则表达式”的字符串查找“公式”，有过编程经验的同学都应该了解正则表达式（Regular Expression 简写regex）是什么东西，它是一种字符串匹配的模式（pattern...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021787021" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up hot"></i></span><span class="votes-num hot ">102</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021787021" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/pig66">猪哥66</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月19日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021782703"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021782703" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021782706)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021782703"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">Flutter EasyLoading - 让全局Toast/Loading更简单</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      ✨flutter_easyloading: 一个简单易用的Flutter插件，包含23种loading动画效果、进度条展示、Toast展示。纯Flutter端实现，支持iOS、Android。✨开源地址：[链接]
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021782703" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up hot"></i></span><span class="votes-num hot ">17</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021782703" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/huangjianke_5c4aab8c66ad9">huangjianke</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月19日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021777457"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021777457" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021777460)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021777457"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">如何快速构建优异的 React 搜索体验</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      构建搜索体验是一项艰巨的任务。它初看起来很简单：构建搜索栏，将数据放入数据库，然后让用户输入内容对数据库进行查询。但是，在数据建模、基础逻辑，当然还有总体设计和用户体验方面，还有许多事情需要考虑。
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021777457" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">6</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021777457" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/elastic_cn">Elastic</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月18日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021772888"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021772888" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/iawKicic66ubH4U4oNRSZrCeiaYY9hGfb5w7CfufLuPjL7ibv3y2m6BASb2HdClib57MX258iadrWoQdH9QKRjhMrvH3Q/640?wx_fmt=jpeg&amp;amp;tp=webp&amp;amp;wxfrom=5&amp;amp;wx_lazy=1&amp;amp;wx_co=1)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021772888"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">原创干货：前端单元测试Jest零基础入门教学</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      写在开头： 单元测试对于很多人比较模式，它是一种推动开发，或者提高产品质量的手段， 我画一张图，大家就能理解 其实单元测试，就是先编写单元测试代码，然后使用单元测试框架，去模拟环境（例如浏览器），然后...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021772888" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">14</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021772888" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/jerrytanjinjie">Peter谭金杰</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月18日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021775938"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021775938" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/bVbDw3w)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021775938"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">一文带你怼明白进程和线程通信原理</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      进程是需要频繁的和其他进程进行交流的。例如，在一个 shell 管道中，第一个进程的输出必须传递给第二个进程，这样沿着管道进行下去。因此，进程之间如果需要通信的话，必须要使用一种良好的数据结构以至于不能被...

        if (typeof URL != 'undefined') {
            var baseUrl = new URL('https://segmentfault.com');

            if (baseUrl.protocol != currentUrl.protocol
                || baseUrl.host != currentUrl.host) {

var _oa = [], OA_google = true;

function OA_script(src, cb) {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    
    if (cb) {
        s.onload = cb;
    }
    
    s.async = 1;
    s.defer = 1;
    s.src = src;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(s, m);
}

function OA_show(name) {
    _oa.push(name);
    document.write('<div id="OA_holder_' + name + '"></div>');
}

mobileScroll(
    function(direction) { 
        try {
            if (direction === 'down') {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.add('hidden')
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.remove('hidden')
            }
        } catch(err) {}
    }
);    
function mobileScroll( fn ) {
    var beforeScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
        fn = fn || function() {};
    window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
        var afterScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
            delta = afterScrollTop - beforeScrollTop;
        if( delta === 0 ) return false;
        fn( delta > 0 ? "down" : "up" );
        beforeScrollTop = afterScrollTop;
    }, false);
}
</script><div class="row hidden-xs hidden-sm"><div class="col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="sf-header__logo"><h1><a href="/">SegmentFault</a></h1></div><div><ul class="menu list-inline pull-left hidden-xs"><li class="menu__item"><a href="/" class="active-nav">首页</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/questions" class="">问答</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/blogs" class="">专栏</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a class=" " href="/lives" class="">课程</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/events" class="">活动</a></li><li class="menu__item menu__item--more dropdown"><a href="##" class="dropdown-toggle dropdownBtn" data-toggle="dropdown">

            <span>Arm 计算</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="tech-square hidden-xs">
          <h5 class="tech-square-title mt0 mb15">技术频道</h5>
        </div>
      </div>

          <a href="/events" class="more-btn pull-right">更多</a>
          <div class="activity-title">活动推荐</div>
          <div class="activity-recommend-area"></div>
        </div>

            <script type='text/javascript'>
                OA_show(1);
            </script>

    </div>

    (function (w) {
        w.SF = {
            staticUrl: "https://cdn.segmentfault.com/v-5e154194"
        };
        w.SF.token = (function () {
    var _3HXpTm = '5'//'r'

    for (var i = 0; i < _gNWzrHp.length; i ++) {

    }

})();;
    })(window);

        type: "",
        text: '',
        table: {"ban_post":[1,"\u4f60\u5df2\u7ecf\u88ab\u7981\u8a00, \u65e0\u6cd5\u8fdb\u884c\u6b64\u64cd\u4f5c, \u5982\u6709\u7591\u4e49\u8bf7\u63d0\u4ea4\u7533\u8bc9, \u6216\u8005\u53d1\u90ae\u4ef6\u5230pr@segmentfault.com"]}
    };

        var ddosMode = false;
    
        (function (currentUrl) {
        if (typeof URL != 'undefined') {
            var baseUrl = new URL('https://segmentfault.com');

            if (baseUrl.protocol != currentUrl.protocol
                || baseUrl.host != currentUrl.host) {
                window.location.href = baseUrl.protocol + '//' + baseUrl.host
                    + currentUrl.pathname + currentUrl.search + currentUrl.hash;
            }
        }
    })(window.location);
    </script>

var _oa = [], OA_google = true;

function OA_script(src, cb) {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    
    if (cb) {
        s.onload = cb;
    }
    
    s.async = 1;
    s.defer = 1;
    s.src = src;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(s, m);
}

function OA_show(name) {
    _oa.push(name);
    document.write('<div id="OA_holder_' + name + '"></div>');
}

mobileScroll(
    function(direction) { 
        try {
            if (direction === 'down') {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.add('hidden')
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.remove('hidden')
            }
        } catch(err) {}
    }
);    
function mobileScroll( fn ) {
    var beforeScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
        fn = fn || function() {};
    window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
        var afterScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
            delta = afterScrollTop - beforeScrollTop;
        if( delta === 0 ) return false;
        fn( delta > 0 ? "down" : "up" );
        beforeScrollTop = afterScrollTop;
    }, false);
}
</script><div class="row hidden-xs hidden-sm"><div class="col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="sf-header__logo"><h1><a href="/">SegmentFault</a></h1></div><div><ul class="menu list-inline pull-left hidden-xs"><li class="menu__item"><a href="/" class="active-nav">首页</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/questions" class="">问答</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/blogs" class="">专栏</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a class=" " href="/lives" class="">课程</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/events" class="">活动</a></li><li class="menu__item menu__item--more dropdown"><a href="##" class="dropdown-toggle dropdownBtn" data-toggle="dropdown">

                      前不久，埃隆·马斯克（Elon Musk）在国外的社交平台上发布了一条推文，准备在自己的家里办一场「超级有趣的黑客马拉松」，一同出席参与的还有特斯拉的 AI 与自动驾驶团队。

                      作者：黄东旭，PingCAP 联合创始人兼 CTO 位于 M87 中心的特大质量黑洞示意图（© EHT Collaboration） 今天的文章我想从这张模糊的照片说起。 相信很多小伙伴对这张照片并不陌生，这是去年人类第一次拍摄的 M87 ...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021811835" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">6</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021811835" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/pingcap">PingCAP</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月22日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021793564"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021793564" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/bVbDBE0)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021793564"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">谷歌云计算部门被曝裁员 50 人，是谷歌不行还是云计算不行？</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      2020 年开年，谷歌宣布收购无代码应用程序开发平台 AppSheet，打响了云战争的第一枪。谷歌表示，AppSheet 的平台“补充了谷歌云的战略，重新构想了应用程序开发空间。”
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021793564" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">7</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021793564" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/weepie">徐九</a><i class="fa fa-check-circle userauth ml5" title="SegmentFault 编辑" data-toggle="tooltip"></i><span class="dot">·</span>2月20日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021787021"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021787021" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021787024)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021787021"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">正则表达式引擎执行原理——从未如此清晰！</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      目前越来越多的网站、编辑器、编程语言都已支持一种叫“正则表达式”的字符串查找“公式”，有过编程经验的同学都应该了解正则表达式（Regular Expression 简写regex）是什么东西，它是一种字符串匹配的模式（pattern...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021787021" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up hot"></i></span><span class="votes-num hot ">102</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021787021" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/pig66">猪哥66</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月19日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021782703"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021782703" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021782706)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021782703"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">Flutter EasyLoading - 让全局Toast/Loading更简单</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      ✨flutter_easyloading: 一个简单易用的Flutter插件，包含23种loading动画效果、进度条展示、Toast展示。纯Flutter端实现，支持iOS、Android。✨开源地址：[链接]
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021782703" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up hot"></i></span><span class="votes-num hot ">17</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021782703" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/huangjianke_5c4aab8c66ad9">huangjianke</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月19日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021777457"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021777457" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021777460)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021777457"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">如何快速构建优异的 React 搜索体验</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      构建搜索体验是一项艰巨的任务。它初看起来很简单：构建搜索栏，将数据放入数据库，然后让用户输入内容对数据库进行查询。但是，在数据建模、基础逻辑，当然还有总体设计和用户体验方面，还有许多事情需要考虑。
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021777457" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">6</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021777457" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/elastic_cn">Elastic</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月18日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021772888"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021772888" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/iawKicic66ubH4U4oNRSZrCeiaYY9hGfb5w7CfufLuPjL7ibv3y2m6BASb2HdClib57MX258iadrWoQdH9QKRjhMrvH3Q/640?wx_fmt=jpeg&amp;amp;tp=webp&amp;amp;wxfrom=5&amp;amp;wx_lazy=1&amp;amp;wx_co=1)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021772888"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">原创干货：前端单元测试Jest零基础入门教学</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      写在开头： 单元测试对于很多人比较模式，它是一种推动开发，或者提高产品质量的手段， 我画一张图，大家就能理解 其实单元测试，就是先编写单元测试代码，然后使用单元测试框架，去模拟环境（例如浏览器），然后...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021772888" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">14</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021772888" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/jerrytanjinjie">Peter谭金杰</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月18日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021775938"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021775938" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/bVbDw3w)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021775938"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">一文带你怼明白进程和线程通信原理</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      进程是需要频繁的和其他进程进行交流的。例如，在一个 shell 管道中，第一个进程的输出必须传递给第二个进程，这样沿着管道进行下去。因此，进程之间如果需要通信的话，必须要使用一种良好的数据结构以至于不能被...

        if (typeof URL != 'undefined') {
            var baseUrl = new URL('https://segmentfault.com');

            if (baseUrl.protocol != currentUrl.protocol
                || baseUrl.host != currentUrl.host) {

var _oa = [], OA_google = true;

function OA_script(src, cb) {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    
    if (cb) {
        s.onload = cb;
    }
    
    s.async = 1;
    s.defer = 1;
    s.src = src;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(s, m);
}

function OA_show(name) {
    _oa.push(name);
    document.write('<div id="OA_holder_' + name + '"></div>');
}

mobileScroll(
    function(direction) { 
        try {
            if (direction === 'down') {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.add('hidden')
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.remove('hidden')
            }
        } catch(err) {}
    }
);    
function mobileScroll( fn ) {
    var beforeScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
        fn = fn || function() {};
    window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
        var afterScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
            delta = afterScrollTop - beforeScrollTop;
        if( delta === 0 ) return false;
        fn( delta > 0 ? "down" : "up" );
        beforeScrollTop = afterScrollTop;
    }, false);
}
</script><div class="row hidden-xs hidden-sm"><div class="col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="sf-header__logo"><h1><a href="/">SegmentFault</a></h1></div><div><ul class="menu list-inline pull-left hidden-xs"><li class="menu__item"><a href="/" class="active-nav">首页</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/questions" class="">问答</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/blogs" class="">专栏</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a class=" " href="/lives" class="">课程</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/events" class="">活动</a></li><li class="menu__item menu__item--more dropdown"><a href="##" class="dropdown-toggle dropdownBtn" data-toggle="dropdown">

            <span>Arm 计算</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="tech-square hidden-xs">
          <h5 class="tech-square-title mt0 mb15">技术频道</h5>
        </div>
      </div>

          <a href="/events" class="more-btn pull-right">更多</a>
          <div class="activity-title">活动推荐</div>
          <div class="activity-recommend-area"></div>
        </div>

            <script type='text/javascript'>
                OA_show(1);
            </script>

    </div>

    (function (w) {
        w.SF = {
            staticUrl: "https://cdn.segmentfault.com/v-5e154194"
        };
        w.SF.token = (function () {
    var _3HXpTm = '5'//'r'

    for (var i = 0; i < _gNWzrHp.length; i ++) {

    }

    })(window);

        type: "",
        text: '',
        table: {"ban_post":[1,"\u4f60\u5df2\u7ecf\u88ab\u7981\u8a00, \u65e0\u6cd5\u8fdb\u884c\u6b64\u64cd\u4f5c, \u5982\u6709\u7591\u4e49\u8bf7\u63d0\u4ea4\u7533\u8bc9, \u6216\u8005\u53d1\u90ae\u4ef6\u5230pr@segmentfault.com"]}
    };

        var ddosMode = false;
    
        (function (currentUrl) {
        if (typeof URL != 'undefined') {
            var baseUrl = new URL('https://segmentfault.com');

            if (baseUrl.protocol != currentUrl.protocol
                || baseUrl.host != currentUrl.host) {
                window.location.href = baseUrl.protocol + '//' + baseUrl.host
                    + currentUrl.pathname + currentUrl.search + currentUrl.hash;
            }
        }
    })(window.location);
    </script>

var _oa = [], OA_google = true;

function OA_script(src, cb) {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    
    if (cb) {
        s.onload = cb;
    }
    
    s.async = 1;
    s.defer = 1;
    s.src = src;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(s, m);
}

function OA_show(name) {
    _oa.push(name);
    document.write('<div id="OA_holder_' + name + '"></div>');
}

mobileScroll(
    function(direction) { 
        try {
            if (direction === 'down') {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.add('hidden')
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.remove('hidden')
            }
        } catch(err) {}
    }
);    
function mobileScroll( fn ) {
    var beforeScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
        fn = fn || function() {};
    window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
        var afterScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
            delta = afterScrollTop - beforeScrollTop;
        if( delta === 0 ) return false;
        fn( delta > 0 ? "down" : "up" );
        beforeScrollTop = afterScrollTop;
    }, false);
}
</script><div class="row hidden-xs hidden-sm"><div class="col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="sf-header__logo"><h1><a href="/">SegmentFault</a></h1></div><div><ul class="menu list-inline pull-left hidden-xs"><li class="menu__item"><a href="/" class="active-nav">首页</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/questions" class="">问答</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/blogs" class="">专栏</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a class=" " href="/lives" class="">课程</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/events" class="">活动</a></li><li class="menu__item menu__item--more dropdown"><a href="##" class="dropdown-toggle dropdownBtn" data-toggle="dropdown">

                      前不久，埃隆·马斯克（Elon Musk）在国外的社交平台上发布了一条推文，准备在自己的家里办一场「超级有趣的黑客马拉松」，一同出席参与的还有特斯拉的 AI 与自动驾驶团队。

                      作者：黄东旭，PingCAP 联合创始人兼 CTO 位于 M87 中心的特大质量黑洞示意图（© EHT Collaboration） 今天的文章我想从这张模糊的照片说起。 相信很多小伙伴对这张照片并不陌生，这是去年人类第一次拍摄的 M87 ...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021811835" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">6</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021811835" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/pingcap">PingCAP</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月22日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021793564"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021793564" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/bVbDBE0)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021793564"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">谷歌云计算部门被曝裁员 50 人，是谷歌不行还是云计算不行？</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      2020 年开年，谷歌宣布收购无代码应用程序开发平台 AppSheet，打响了云战争的第一枪。谷歌表示，AppSheet 的平台“补充了谷歌云的战略，重新构想了应用程序开发空间。”
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021793564" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">7</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021793564" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/weepie">徐九</a><i class="fa fa-check-circle userauth ml5" title="SegmentFault 编辑" data-toggle="tooltip"></i><span class="dot">·</span>2月20日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021787021"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021787021" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021787024)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021787021"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">正则表达式引擎执行原理——从未如此清晰！</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      目前越来越多的网站、编辑器、编程语言都已支持一种叫“正则表达式”的字符串查找“公式”，有过编程经验的同学都应该了解正则表达式（Regular Expression 简写regex）是什么东西，它是一种字符串匹配的模式（pattern...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021787021" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up hot"></i></span><span class="votes-num hot ">102</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021787021" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/pig66">猪哥66</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月19日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021782703"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021782703" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021782706)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021782703"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">Flutter EasyLoading - 让全局Toast/Loading更简单</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      ✨flutter_easyloading: 一个简单易用的Flutter插件，包含23种loading动画效果、进度条展示、Toast展示。纯Flutter端实现，支持iOS、Android。✨开源地址：[链接]
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021782703" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up hot"></i></span><span class="votes-num hot ">17</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021782703" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/huangjianke_5c4aab8c66ad9">huangjianke</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月19日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021777457"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021777457" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021777460)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021777457"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">如何快速构建优异的 React 搜索体验</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      构建搜索体验是一项艰巨的任务。它初看起来很简单：构建搜索栏，将数据放入数据库，然后让用户输入内容对数据库进行查询。但是，在数据建模、基础逻辑，当然还有总体设计和用户体验方面，还有许多事情需要考虑。
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021777457" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">6</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021777457" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/elastic_cn">Elastic</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月18日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021772888"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021772888" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/iawKicic66ubH4U4oNRSZrCeiaYY9hGfb5w7CfufLuPjL7ibv3y2m6BASb2HdClib57MX258iadrWoQdH9QKRjhMrvH3Q/640?wx_fmt=jpeg&amp;amp;tp=webp&amp;amp;wxfrom=5&amp;amp;wx_lazy=1&amp;amp;wx_co=1)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021772888"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">原创干货：前端单元测试Jest零基础入门教学</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      写在开头： 单元测试对于很多人比较模式，它是一种推动开发，或者提高产品质量的手段， 我画一张图，大家就能理解 其实单元测试，就是先编写单元测试代码，然后使用单元测试框架，去模拟环境（例如浏览器），然后...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021772888" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">14</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021772888" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/jerrytanjinjie">Peter谭金杰</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月18日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021775938"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021775938" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/bVbDw3w)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021775938"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">一文带你怼明白进程和线程通信原理</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      进程是需要频繁的和其他进程进行交流的。例如，在一个 shell 管道中，第一个进程的输出必须传递给第二个进程，这样沿着管道进行下去。因此，进程之间如果需要通信的话，必须要使用一种良好的数据结构以至于不能被...

        if (typeof URL != 'undefined') {
            var baseUrl = new URL('https://segmentfault.com');

            if (baseUrl.protocol != currentUrl.protocol
                || baseUrl.host != currentUrl.host) {

var _oa = [], OA_google = true;

function OA_script(src, cb) {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    
    if (cb) {
        s.onload = cb;
    }
    
    s.async = 1;
    s.defer = 1;
    s.src = src;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(s, m);
}

function OA_show(name) {
    _oa.push(name);
    document.write('<div id="OA_holder_' + name + '"></div>');
}

mobileScroll(
    function(direction) { 
        try {
            if (direction === 'down') {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.add('hidden')
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.remove('hidden')
            }
        } catch(err) {}
    }
);    
function mobileScroll( fn ) {
    var beforeScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
        fn = fn || function() {};
    window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
        var afterScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
            delta = afterScrollTop - beforeScrollTop;
        if( delta === 0 ) return false;
        fn( delta > 0 ? "down" : "up" );
        beforeScrollTop = afterScrollTop;
    }, false);
}
</script><div class="row hidden-xs hidden-sm"><div class="col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="sf-header__logo"><h1><a href="/">SegmentFault</a></h1></div><div><ul class="menu list-inline pull-left hidden-xs"><li class="menu__item"><a href="/" class="active-nav">首页</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/questions" class="">问答</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/blogs" class="">专栏</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a class=" " href="/lives" class="">课程</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/events" class="">活动</a></li><li class="menu__item menu__item--more dropdown"><a href="##" class="dropdown-toggle dropdownBtn" data-toggle="dropdown">

            <span>Arm 计算</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="tech-square hidden-xs">
          <h5 class="tech-square-title mt0 mb15">技术频道</h5>
        </div>
      </div>

          <a href="/events" class="more-btn pull-right">更多</a>
          <div class="activity-title">活动推荐</div>
          <div class="activity-recommend-area"></div>
        </div>

            <script type='text/javascript'>
                OA_show(1);
            </script>

    </div>

    (function (w) {
        w.SF = {
            staticUrl: "https://cdn.segmentfault.com/v-5e154194"
        };
        w.SF.token = (function () {
    var _3HXpTm = '5'//'r'

    for (var i = 0; i < _gNWzrHp.length; i ++) {

    }

})();;
    })(window);

        type: "",
        text: '',
        table: {"ban_post":[1,"\u4f60\u5df2\u7ecf\u88ab\u7981\u8a00, \u65e0\u6cd5\u8fdb\u884c\u6b64\u64cd\u4f5c, \u5982\u6709\u7591\u4e49\u8bf7\u63d0\u4ea4\u7533\u8bc9, \u6216\u8005\u53d1\u90ae\u4ef6\u5230pr@segmentfault.com"]}
    };

        var ddosMode = false;
    
        (function (currentUrl) {
        if (typeof URL != 'undefined') {
            var baseUrl = new URL('https://segmentfault.com');

            if (baseUrl.protocol != currentUrl.protocol
                || baseUrl.host != currentUrl.host) {
                window.location.href = baseUrl.protocol + '//' + baseUrl.host
                    + currentUrl.pathname + currentUrl.search + currentUrl.hash;
            }
        }
    })(window.location);
    </script>

var _oa = [], OA_google = true;

function OA_script(src, cb) {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    
    if (cb) {
        s.onload = cb;
    }
    
    s.async = 1;
    s.defer = 1;
    s.src = src;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(s, m);
}

function OA_show(name) {
    _oa.push(name);
    document.write('<div id="OA_holder_' + name + '"></div>');
}

mobileScroll(
    function(direction) { 
        try {
            if (direction === 'down') {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.add('hidden')
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.remove('hidden')
            }
        } catch(err) {}
    }
);    
function mobileScroll( fn ) {
    var beforeScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
        fn = fn || function() {};
    window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
        var afterScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
            delta = afterScrollTop - beforeScrollTop;
        if( delta === 0 ) return false;
        fn( delta > 0 ? "down" : "up" );
        beforeScrollTop = afterScrollTop;
    }, false);
}
</script><div class="row hidden-xs hidden-sm"><div class="col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="sf-header__logo"><h1><a href="/">SegmentFault</a></h1></div><div><ul class="menu list-inline pull-left hidden-xs"><li class="menu__item"><a href="/" class="active-nav">首页</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/questions" class="">问答</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/blogs" class="">专栏</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a class=" " href="/lives" class="">课程</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/events" class="">活动</a></li><li class="menu__item menu__item--more dropdown"><a href="##" class="dropdown-toggle dropdownBtn" data-toggle="dropdown">

                      前不久，埃隆·马斯克（Elon Musk）在国外的社交平台上发布了一条推文，准备在自己的家里办一场「超级有趣的黑客马拉松」，一同出席参与的还有特斯拉的 AI 与自动驾驶团队。

                      作者：黄东旭，PingCAP 联合创始人兼 CTO 位于 M87 中心的特大质量黑洞示意图（© EHT Collaboration） 今天的文章我想从这张模糊的照片说起。 相信很多小伙伴对这张照片并不陌生，这是去年人类第一次拍摄的 M87 ...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021811835" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">6</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021811835" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/pingcap">PingCAP</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月22日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021793564"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021793564" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/bVbDBE0)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021793564"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">谷歌云计算部门被曝裁员 50 人，是谷歌不行还是云计算不行？</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      2020 年开年，谷歌宣布收购无代码应用程序开发平台 AppSheet，打响了云战争的第一枪。谷歌表示，AppSheet 的平台“补充了谷歌云的战略，重新构想了应用程序开发空间。”
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021793564" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">7</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021793564" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/weepie">徐九</a><i class="fa fa-check-circle userauth ml5" title="SegmentFault 编辑" data-toggle="tooltip"></i><span class="dot">·</span>2月20日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021787021"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021787021" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021787024)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021787021"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">正则表达式引擎执行原理——从未如此清晰！</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      目前越来越多的网站、编辑器、编程语言都已支持一种叫“正则表达式”的字符串查找“公式”，有过编程经验的同学都应该了解正则表达式（Regular Expression 简写regex）是什么东西，它是一种字符串匹配的模式（pattern...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021787021" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up hot"></i></span><span class="votes-num hot ">102</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021787021" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/pig66">猪哥66</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月19日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021782703"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021782703" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021782706)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021782703"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">Flutter EasyLoading - 让全局Toast/Loading更简单</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      ✨flutter_easyloading: 一个简单易用的Flutter插件，包含23种loading动画效果、进度条展示、Toast展示。纯Flutter端实现，支持iOS、Android。✨开源地址：[链接]
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021782703" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up hot"></i></span><span class="votes-num hot ">17</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021782703" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/huangjianke_5c4aab8c66ad9">huangjianke</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月19日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021777457"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021777457" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021777460)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021777457"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">如何快速构建优异的 React 搜索体验</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      构建搜索体验是一项艰巨的任务。它初看起来很简单：构建搜索栏，将数据放入数据库，然后让用户输入内容对数据库进行查询。但是，在数据建模、基础逻辑，当然还有总体设计和用户体验方面，还有许多事情需要考虑。
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021777457" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">6</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021777457" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/elastic_cn">Elastic</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月18日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021772888"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021772888" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/iawKicic66ubH4U4oNRSZrCeiaYY9hGfb5w7CfufLuPjL7ibv3y2m6BASb2HdClib57MX258iadrWoQdH9QKRjhMrvH3Q/640?wx_fmt=jpeg&amp;amp;tp=webp&amp;amp;wxfrom=5&amp;amp;wx_lazy=1&amp;amp;wx_co=1)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021772888"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">原创干货：前端单元测试Jest零基础入门教学</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      写在开头： 单元测试对于很多人比较模式，它是一种推动开发，或者提高产品质量的手段， 我画一张图，大家就能理解 其实单元测试，就是先编写单元测试代码，然后使用单元测试框架，去模拟环境（例如浏览器），然后...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021772888" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">14</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021772888" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/jerrytanjinjie">Peter谭金杰</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月18日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021775938"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021775938" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/bVbDw3w)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021775938"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">一文带你怼明白进程和线程通信原理</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      进程是需要频繁的和其他进程进行交流的。例如，在一个 shell 管道中，第一个进程的输出必须传递给第二个进程，这样沿着管道进行下去。因此，进程之间如果需要通信的话，必须要使用一种良好的数据结构以至于不能被...

        if (typeof URL != 'undefined') {
            var baseUrl = new URL('https://segmentfault.com');

            if (baseUrl.protocol != currentUrl.protocol
                || baseUrl.host != currentUrl.host) {

var _oa = [], OA_google = true;

function OA_script(src, cb) {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    
    if (cb) {
        s.onload = cb;
    }
    
    s.async = 1;
    s.defer = 1;
    s.src = src;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(s, m);
}

function OA_show(name) {
    _oa.push(name);
    document.write('<div id="OA_holder_' + name + '"></div>');
}

mobileScroll(
    function(direction) { 
        try {
            if (direction === 'down') {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.add('hidden')
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.remove('hidden')
            }
        } catch(err) {}
    }
);    
function mobileScroll( fn ) {
    var beforeScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
        fn = fn || function() {};
    window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
        var afterScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
            delta = afterScrollTop - beforeScrollTop;
        if( delta === 0 ) return false;
        fn( delta > 0 ? "down" : "up" );
        beforeScrollTop = afterScrollTop;
    }, false);
}
</script><div class="row hidden-xs hidden-sm"><div class="col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="sf-header__logo"><h1><a href="/">SegmentFault</a></h1></div><div><ul class="menu list-inline pull-left hidden-xs"><li class="menu__item"><a href="/" class="active-nav">首页</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/questions" class="">问答</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/blogs" class="">专栏</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a class=" " href="/lives" class="">课程</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/events" class="">活动</a></li><li class="menu__item menu__item--more dropdown"><a href="##" class="dropdown-toggle dropdownBtn" data-toggle="dropdown">

            <span>Arm 计算</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="tech-square hidden-xs">
          <h5 class="tech-square-title mt0 mb15">技术频道</h5>
        </div>
      </div>

          <a href="/events" class="more-btn pull-right">更多</a>
          <div class="activity-title">活动推荐</div>
          <div class="activity-recommend-area"></div>
        </div>

            <script type='text/javascript'>
                OA_show(1);
            </script>

    </div>

    (function (w) {
        w.SF = {
            staticUrl: "https://cdn.segmentfault.com/v-5e154194"
        };
        w.SF.token = (function () {
    var _3HXpTm = '5'//'r'

    for (var i = 0; i < _gNWzrHp.length; i ++) {

    }

})();;
    })(window);

        type: "",
        text: '',
        table: {"ban_post":[1,"\u4f60\u5df2\u7ecf\u88ab\u7981\u8a00, \u65e0\u6cd5\u8fdb\u884c\u6b64\u64cd\u4f5c, \u5982\u6709\u7591\u4e49\u8bf7\u63d0\u4ea4\u7533\u8bc9, \u6216\u8005\u53d1\u90ae\u4ef6\u5230pr@segmentfault.com"]}
    };

        var ddosMode = false;
    
        (function (currentUrl) {
        if (typeof URL != 'undefined') {
            var baseUrl = new URL('https://segmentfault.com');

            if (baseUrl.protocol != currentUrl.protocol
                || baseUrl.host != currentUrl.host) {
                window.location.href = baseUrl.protocol + '//' + baseUrl.host
                    + currentUrl.pathname + currentUrl.search + currentUrl.hash;
            }
        }
    })(window.location);
    </script>

var _oa = [], OA_google = true;

function OA_script(src, cb) {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    
    if (cb) {
        s.onload = cb;
    }
    
    s.async = 1;
    s.defer = 1;
    s.src = src;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(s, m);
}

function OA_show(name) {
    _oa.push(name);
    document.write('<div id="OA_holder_' + name + '"></div>');
}

mobileScroll(
    function(direction) { 
        try {
            if (direction === 'down') {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.add('hidden')
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.remove('hidden')
            }
        } catch(err) {}
    }
);    
function mobileScroll( fn ) {
    var beforeScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
        fn = fn || function() {};
    window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
        var afterScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
            delta = afterScrollTop - beforeScrollTop;
        if( delta === 0 ) return false;
        fn( delta > 0 ? "down" : "up" );
        beforeScrollTop = afterScrollTop;
    }, false);
}
</script><div class="row hidden-xs hidden-sm"><div class="col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="sf-header__logo"><h1><a href="/">SegmentFault</a></h1></div><div><ul class="menu list-inline pull-left hidden-xs"><li class="menu__item"><a href="/" class="active-nav">首页</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/questions" class="">问答</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/blogs" class="">专栏</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a class=" " href="/lives" class="">课程</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/events" class="">活动</a></li><li class="menu__item menu__item--more dropdown"><a href="##" class="dropdown-toggle dropdownBtn" data-toggle="dropdown">

                      前不久，埃隆·马斯克（Elon Musk）在国外的社交平台上发布了一条推文，准备在自己的家里办一场「超级有趣的黑客马拉松」，一同出席参与的还有特斯拉的 AI 与自动驾驶团队。

                      作者：黄东旭，PingCAP 联合创始人兼 CTO 位于 M87 中心的特大质量黑洞示意图（© EHT Collaboration） 今天的文章我想从这张模糊的照片说起。 相信很多小伙伴对这张照片并不陌生，这是去年人类第一次拍摄的 M87 ...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021811835" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">6</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021811835" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/pingcap">PingCAP</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月22日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021793564"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021793564" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/bVbDBE0)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021793564"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">谷歌云计算部门被曝裁员 50 人，是谷歌不行还是云计算不行？</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      2020 年开年，谷歌宣布收购无代码应用程序开发平台 AppSheet，打响了云战争的第一枪。谷歌表示，AppSheet 的平台“补充了谷歌云的战略，重新构想了应用程序开发空间。”
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021793564" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">7</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021793564" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/weepie">徐九</a><i class="fa fa-check-circle userauth ml5" title="SegmentFault 编辑" data-toggle="tooltip"></i><span class="dot">·</span>2月20日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021787021"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021787021" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021787024)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021787021"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">正则表达式引擎执行原理——从未如此清晰！</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      目前越来越多的网站、编辑器、编程语言都已支持一种叫“正则表达式”的字符串查找“公式”，有过编程经验的同学都应该了解正则表达式（Regular Expression 简写regex）是什么东西，它是一种字符串匹配的模式（pattern...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021787021" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up hot"></i></span><span class="votes-num hot ">102</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021787021" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/pig66">猪哥66</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月19日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021782703"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021782703" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021782706)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021782703"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">Flutter EasyLoading - 让全局Toast/Loading更简单</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      ✨flutter_easyloading: 一个简单易用的Flutter插件，包含23种loading动画效果、进度条展示、Toast展示。纯Flutter端实现，支持iOS、Android。✨开源地址：[链接]
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021782703" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up hot"></i></span><span class="votes-num hot ">17</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021782703" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/huangjianke_5c4aab8c66ad9">huangjianke</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月19日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021777457"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021777457" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/remote/1460000021777460)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021777457"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">如何快速构建优异的 React 搜索体验</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      构建搜索体验是一项艰巨的任务。它初看起来很简单：构建搜索栏，将数据放入数据库，然后让用户输入内容对数据库进行查询。但是，在数据建模、基础逻辑，当然还有总体设计和用户体验方面，还有许多事情需要考虑。
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021777457" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">6</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021777457" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/elastic_cn">Elastic</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月18日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021772888"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021772888" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/iawKicic66ubH4U4oNRSZrCeiaYY9hGfb5w7CfufLuPjL7ibv3y2m6BASb2HdClib57MX258iadrWoQdH9QKRjhMrvH3Q/640?wx_fmt=jpeg&amp;amp;tp=webp&amp;amp;wxfrom=5&amp;amp;wx_lazy=1&amp;amp;wx_co=1)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021772888"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">原创干货：前端单元测试Jest零基础入门教学</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      写在开头： 单元测试对于很多人比较模式，它是一种推动开发，或者提高产品质量的手段， 我画一张图，大家就能理解 其实单元测试，就是先编写单元测试代码，然后使用单元测试框架，去模拟环境（例如浏览器），然后...
                    </div></a><div class="news__item-meta"><span class="pr20 votes-operation " data-id="1190000021772888" data-type="article"><span class="wrap"><i class="fa fa-thumbs-up "></i></span><span class="votes-num  ">14</span><span class="dot ">·</span><span class="votes-word">赞</span></span><span class="bookmark-operation pr20 hidden" data-id="1190000021772888" data-type="article"><i class="fa fa-bookmark pr5"></i><span class="bookmark-word">收藏</span></span><span class="author pr20"><a href="/u/jerrytanjinjie">Peter谭金杰</a><span class="dot">·</span>2月18日</span></div></div></div><div class="news-item stream__item clearfix mt15" data-id="1190000021775938"><div class="news__item-info clearfix"><a href="/a/1190000021775938" class="news-img" style="background-image:url(https://segmentfault.com/img/bVbDw3w)"></a><a target="_blank" href="/a/1190000021775938"><div class="mb5 mt5"><h4 class="news__item-title mt0">一文带你怼明白进程和线程通信原理</h4></div><div class="article-excerpt">
                      进程是需要频繁的和其他进程进行交流的。例如，在一个 shell 管道中，第一个进程的输出必须传递给第二个进程，这样沿着管道进行下去。因此，进程之间如果需要通信的话，必须要使用一种良好的数据结构以至于不能被...

        if (typeof URL != 'undefined') {
            var baseUrl = new URL('https://segmentfault.com');

            if (baseUrl.protocol != currentUrl.protocol
                || baseUrl.host != currentUrl.host) {

var _oa = [], OA_google = true;

function OA_script(src, cb) {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    
    if (cb) {
        s.onload = cb;
    }
    
    s.async = 1;
    s.defer = 1;
    s.src = src;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(s, m);
}

function OA_show(name) {
    _oa.push(name);
    document.write('<div id="OA_holder_' + name + '"></div>');
}

mobileScroll(
    function(direction) { 
        try {
            if (direction === 'down') {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.add('hidden')
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.remove('hidden')
            }
        } catch(err) {}
    }
);    
function mobileScroll( fn ) {
    var beforeScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
        fn = fn || function() {};
    window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
        var afterScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
            delta = afterScrollTop - beforeScrollTop;
        if( delta === 0 ) return false;
        fn( delta > 0 ? "down" : "up" );
        beforeScrollTop = afterScrollTop;
    }, false);
}
</script><div class="row hidden-xs hidden-sm"><div class="col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="sf-header__logo"><h1><a href="/">SegmentFault</a></h1></div><div><ul class="menu list-inline pull-left hidden-xs"><li class="menu__item"><a href="/" class="active-nav">首页</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/questions" class="">问答</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/blogs" class="">专栏</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a class=" " href="/lives" class="">课程</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/events" class="">活动</a></li><li class="menu__item menu__item--more dropdown"><a href="##" class="dropdown-toggle dropdownBtn" data-toggle="dropdown">

            <span>Arm 计算</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="tech-square hidden-xs">
          <h5 class="tech-square-title mt0 mb15">技术频道</h5>
        </div>
      </div>

          <a href="/events" class="more-btn pull-right">更多</a>
          <div class="activity-title">活动推荐</div>
          <div class="activity-recommend-area"></div>
        </div>

            <script type='text/javascript'>
                OA_show(1);
            </script>

    </div>

    (function (w) {
        w.SF = {
            staticUrl: "https://cdn.segmentfault.com/v-5e154194"
        };
        w.SF.token = (function () {
    var _3HXpTm = '5'//'r'

    for (var i = 0; i < _gNWzrHp.length; i ++) {

    }

})();;
    })(window);

        type: "",
        text: '',
        table: {"ban_post":[1,"\u4f60\u5df2\u7ecf\u88ab\u7981\u8a00, \u65e0\u6cd5\u8fdb\u884c\u6b64\u64cd\u4f5c, \u5982\u6709\u7591\u4e49\u8bf7\u63d0\u4ea4\u7533\u8bc9, \u6216\u8005\u53d1\u90ae\u4ef6\u5230pr@segmentfault.com"]}
    };

        var ddosMode = false;
    
        (function (currentUrl) {
        if (typeof URL != 'undefined') {
            var baseUrl = new URL('https://segmentfault.com');

            if (baseUrl.protocol != currentUrl.protocol
                || baseUrl.host != currentUrl.host) {
                window.location.href = baseUrl.protocol + '//' + baseUrl.host
                    + currentUrl.pathname + currentUrl.search + currentUrl.hash;
            }
        }
    })(window.location);
    </script>

var _oa = [], OA_google = true;

function OA_script(src, cb) {
    var s = document.createElement('script'), m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    
    if (cb) {
        s.onload = cb;
    }
    
    s.async = 1;
    s.defer = 1;
    s.src = src;
    m.parentNode.insertBefore(s, m);
}

function OA_show(name) {
    _oa.push(name);
    document.write('<div id="OA_holder_' + name + '"></div>');
}

mobileScroll(
    function(direction) { 
        try {
            if (direction === 'down') {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.add('hidden')
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.bottom-nav').classList.remove('hidden')
            }
        } catch(err) {}
    }
);    
function mobileScroll( fn ) {
    var beforeScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
        fn = fn || function() {};
    window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
        var afterScrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop,
            delta = afterScrollTop - beforeScrollTop;
        if( delta === 0 ) return false;
        fn( delta > 0 ? "down" : "up" );
        beforeScrollTop = afterScrollTop;
    }, false);
}
</script><div class="row hidden-xs hidden-sm"><div class="col-sm-8 col-md-9 col-lg-9"><div class="sf-header__logo"><h1><a href="/">SegmentFault</a></h1></div><div><ul class="menu list-inline pull-left hidden-xs"><li class="menu__item"><a href="/" class="active-nav">首页</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/questions" class="">问答</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/blogs" class="">专栏</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a class=" " href="/lives" class="">课程</a></li><li class="menu__item"><a href="/events" class="">活动</a></li><li class="menu__item menu__item--more dropdown"><a href="##" class="dropdown-toggle dropdownBtn" data-toggle="dropdown">

                      前不久，埃隆·马斯克（Elon Musk）在国外的社交平台上发布了一条推文，准备在自己的家里办一场「超级有趣的黑客马拉松」，一同出席参与的还有特斯拉的 AI 与自动驾驶团队。
